data.message: How I can change my page name?

replies.message: Hey Justy. If less than 200 people like your Page, you must be an admin or editor to change your Page's name. If 200 or more people like your Page, you must be an admin to submit a request to change your Page's name. If your request is approved, you won't be able to change your Page's name again. You can only change your Page's name once. For more information on changing your Page's name, please visit our Help Center here: https://www.facebook.com/help/271607792873806 -Hailey
